text: Indlela yabo yokucela apho iya kuba nguSubhanaka Allâhumma (uZuko malube kuWe O Allâh) nokuthi: Salâm (makube luxolo nokhuseleko ebubini), iya kuba ngumbuliso wabo apho (ePaladesi)! Ize ukuqukumbela kwabo isicelo sabo ibe nguAlhamdulillâhi rabbil’âlamîm (Iindumiso nemibulelo yonke mayibe kuAllâh iNkosi, uMlondolozi wamazwe)
